description: During [Operation Honeybee](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0006), stolen data was copied into a text file using the format `From <COMPUTER-NAME> (<Month>-<Day> <Hour>-<Minute>-<Second>).txt` prior to compression, encoding, and exfiltration.(Citation: McAfee Honeybee)

external_references.description: Sherstobitoff, R. (2018, March 02). McAfee Uncovers Operation Honeybee, a Malicious Document Campaign Targeting Humanitarian Aid Groups. Retrieved May 16, 2018.
